ygData.subject: Re: Clarification on lvl 115
ygData.msgSnippet: no, PvP server doesn t always get as many bug fixes etc. that we do (ie. recent guild bug), let alone new features. If it s on a server, it s the test server,
ygData.messageBody:
no, PvP server doesn't always get as many bug fixes etc. that we do (ie. recent
guild bug), let alone new features. If it's on a server, it's the test server,
but I doubt it's even there :( The last thing they put there for trade skills
was dough, and that's the only thing they did to the skills besides nerf
brewing. I don't think they'll be implementing a full set of armor to be made by
smiths as an unannounced change like they did with dough. Of course, I could be
entirely wrong =P
-Rennin of E'Ci
Trade Council GM
